scripts.test: echo SKIPPED: No tests specified. For Cloudflare workers we might want to look into https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers/testing/
scripts.OLD-deploy: branch=$(git branch --show-current); wrangler versions upload --tag ${branch} --preview-alias ${branch} --var HELIX_ORIGIN_HOSTNAME:${branch}--koassets--aemsites.aem.live --message "$(if git diff --quiet .; then git log -1 --pretty=%B; else echo '<local changes>'; fi)"
scripts.OLD-deploy-tail: npm run deploy && npm run tail
scripts.OLD-deploy:prod: wrangler versions upload --tag PRODUCTION --message "$(git diff --quiet . && git log -1 --pretty=%B)" && wrangler versions deploy -y $(wrangler versions list --json | jq -r '.[] | select (.annotations."workers/tag" == "MAIN") | .id')
